name: ROBOIZ
description:
This was done for Global Game Jam 2020

The theme was Repair

Army and Leggy must work together to navigate through the factory. 

Playing with a friend recommended. But still playable on your own. 

-Controllers- Recommended Left stick move A to interact B to separate

 -Keyboard- 

P1: WASD to move and Interact

 P2: Arrow Keys to move and Interact

ok have fun!
